job.description: Captures an ERROR string from a script output and FAIL JOB based in that
job.name: CaptureErrorLogAndFail

ruleset.rules:
[*] run-in-sequence
# STEP 1 is is the Original Script, captures ERROR value and exports variable to Global Context. # if necessary, performs any required steps BEFORE or AFTER the script # step 2 is the export for the value # step 3 is just an echo of the export value [1] run-at-start [2] run-after:1
#if an "ERROR" message is present in Script Output, the Job should FAIL [3] if:export.ERROR==export.ERROR
